markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Storm's Lash](/Feats.aspx?ID=5677) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=776" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 34 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Wind and lightning have always been friends to you. You can cast the [_electric arc_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1509) cantrip as a primal innate spell at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell rank equal to half your level rounded up.
name: Storm's Lash

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 1" pfs="Standard" > Storm's Lash Source Player Core 2 pg. 34 1.1 --- Wind and lightning have always been friends to you. You can cast the electric arc cantrip as a primal innate spell at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell rank equal to half your level rounded up.
